evidence_in_dialogue: [[LORI HUTCHINS]] she fires . ( The dart hits the ceiling instead as she falls backward on the ground . )
[[Brass]] well, we found your prints on the rail going down into the cargo hold
[[Mrs._Frommer]] i think it 's pretty clear that my daughter 's life was just way out of my hands
[[Grissom]] uncut diamonds ? the horse is a 'mule'
[[Warrick]] i think we can convince a jury that you did more than just watch
